name: Sword
description: A simple yet effective weapon. Useable even without much training.

abilities.name: Slash
abilities.description: Swing your sword at a target, dealing 6 {Slashing} {Damage}.
abilities.bonus:
For each bonus, deal an additional 3 {Slashing} {Damage}.

If you gain at least 2 bonuses, inflict a {Physical_Wound} that disables a limb of theirs.

abilities.name: Stab
abilities.description: Stab your sword into the target, dealing 4 {Piercing} {Damage}.
abilities.bonus: For each bonus, deal an additional 4 {Piercing} {Damage} and inflict a {Physical_Wound} that temporarily reduces their {Physique} by 1 level.
